alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 415 PM MST... At 330 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Carlos, or 16 miles southeast of Globe, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, San Carlos and Cutter. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 254 and 255. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 271. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 167 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
